comments: This professor is so awesome. I absolutely loved her class. To be completely honest, her class isn\'t hard. With that being said, she gives you interesting essay topics and she gives great feedback. If I could, I would take her class again. She\'s a breath of fresh air.

loved her! hipster, young, chill and very smart. She wants you to think outside of the box. Grades you on your creativity. Highly recommend her! i was one of the few who actually talked in her class. take her!!!!
super funny. super chill. super understandable. and very lenient grader. She is the best! i highly recommend her!
She\'s amazing! Easy class but you actually learn. She\'s extremely helpful and has a great sense of humor. TAKE HER CLASS! There\'s a reason why her classes fill up so quickly.

Amazing professor! Keeps you motivated and lectures are fun! Great sense of humor and really connects with her students. I highly recommend her. Work is simple and easy to do and she is very helpful. Best English professor I have had in a while :]

Loved her English 100 class. I trully learned how to "Critically Think." I wish I could have done better, it wasn\'t the course that was hard, it was my personal ability to keep up. Take this class, she\'s a great teacher, very supportive and easy going. She is pretty funny too. :-)
AWESOME!!!! :D TAKE HER!
Awesome professor! So awkward yet funny :)
I trully appreciate Professor Gallagher\'s teaching style. I would write more, but, I\'m in a computer lab, participating in a group effort, and not helping. She\'s GREAT!

BEST ENGLISH PROF i had in college. love how she is always so interested in what we have to say and so helpful. Learn a lot in this class. answers her email daily and helps you on your essay if you ask. HIGHLY RECOMMEND -- fancy tennis shoes =]
Enjoyed her class very much. Must participate, class discussions are fun and interesting. Fair grader, answers emails very fast! passionate, knowledgeable, and not to mention pretty.

She is the best English teacher I have ever had.She cares about the students who are willing to put in efforts and she appreciates any thoughts students made in the class discussion.She even reviews your intro paragraph! Having said that, I don?t mean it?s an easy class.Be ready to work hard and be ACTIVE!I ended up with an A and I?m an ESL student
4 words...TAKE HER CLASS, PERIOD!

Best teacher i\'ve ever had, in any class....ever. seriously awesome. i went into her class not so interested in english and left thinking i wanted to be an english major, then i went to the next class and realized it was just her that made it so awesome. BEST TEACHER I WILL EVER HAVE. coolest girl ever, i will never forget this professor. :D
if you get a chance to take her class, do it. Period.

Great Teacher!!! She doesnt stress the small stuff and she is more interested in your opinion than anything. The more the class participates, the less work she gives. If you cant pass this class, it just wasnt meant to be.

She puts in a lot of work for each class. There are a good deal of assignments, but its easy to get help. Participation is emphasized (I found myself participating a lot when I rarely do in most classes). Her grading is fair and she places high value on effort and improvement.

One of the best teachers I\'ve taken so far at PCC. I was never a big fan of English but she makes the class interesting (make sure you participate), the workload is very manageable, and as long as you communicate (talk or email) any issues you\'re having, she works with you. A+++

She is a great prof if u r getting back n2 school. very clear instructions & extremely structured notes/teachings. attn is a must & participation is a must don\'t be fooled u MUST do ur wk. ask questions they WILL BE answered! Highly recommend Prof. Gallagher 2 any student looking 2 improve their writing skills. great foundation class 4 ur career
She is the best English in PCC!! Cless is fun and Grades are fairly. If you need to take an english class, she is the best one for you!
